title: Assassin Mains Seeing the Tank Buffs on the PBE And Crying to Riot

replies.body: Oh please, assassin mains can't tell the difference between a tank and a skirmisher.
But than u remember assasin mains cries for fucking everything.

Assassin mains have been spoon fed for the last few seasons they can sink to the bottom for now.

Which won't happen because the new runes still exist, they will still be at the top.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Rhinark,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EYJTMTBu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-07T10:16:47.614+0000)
>
> Attack on Shitan is overrated.

No.

> [{quoted}](name=Legend Alpha ,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EYJTMTBu,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-08-07T11:37:45.982+0000)
>
> No.

You're entitled to your opinion, just know that you are wrong.
I wish assassins were gutted and im an assassin main :/
I'm a mages and crying actually .. lol at least armor feels useless , MR isn't useless and has always been a very very huge problem to mages except shits like Brand

Can we stop saying assassin main, because not all assassins are health. AD Assassins are the problem especially with certain items. I am an Ekko main and I would love to see more tanks then these AS assassins running the rift and bending all the other champions over a barrel. So not crying I want more game diversity PLEASE.
